body:
@18epedersen I think it'd be beneficial if you made a complete pass over the site and determined what needs ID's/etc, so we can get them all put in place in one go (versus frequent requests/updates).

You can use github's `task list` formatting to make a checkbox to better track progress as well, e.g.:

- [x] Add ID to this thing
- [ ] Add ID to that thing
